channel.title: Odd Question
channel.description:
I know this is going to start another religous conflict but if your Christian, or follow any other god(notice how its not capitalized) would it make you a satanic follower if you listen to a satanic band.
Behemoth is such a great band, but they are satanic :\ so i'm just afraid if i listen to them it would make me satanic etc,
What i usually go by is it won't effect you if you don't want it to and you could still enjoy music and follow whatever you want, but i'm not sure if it's true anymore.

item.title: Odd Question
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Well, I think it is wrong to us as humans, but to God as a higher being it is not as important, since everyone will become part of him eventually.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd Question
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Do you mean killing isn’t wrong?
Stealing isn’t wrong.
The 2 thing I am very sure God and Human think is bad thing to do.

en.wikipedia.org

Ten Commandments

The Ten Commandments (Hebrew: .mw-parser-output .script-hebrew,.mw-parser-output .script-Hebr{font-size:1.15em;font-family:"Ezra SIL","Ezra SIL SR","Keter Aram Tsova","Taamey Ashkenaz","Taamey David CLM","Taamey Frank CLM","Frank Ruehl CLM","Keter YG","Shofar","David CLM","Hadasim CLM","Simple CLM","Nachlieli","SBL BibLit","SBL Hebrew",Cardo,Alef,"Noto Serif Hebrew","Noto Sans Hebrew","David Libre",David,"Times New Roman",Gisha,Arial,FreeSerif,FreeSans}עֲשֶׂרֶת הַדִּבְּרוֹת, Aseret ha'Dibrot),...

But i have not said hear on music is wrong just because its text.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd Question
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Well, while you are right, I do not wish to argue, but I am just stating my belief that I think what humans consider wrong is different from what God considers wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd Question
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:15, topic:181558”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=243084.msg2055516#msg2055516 date=1203133762]

Warning: This post will have religious backing to it. Please do not read it if you are going to start an argument over this.

It does not make you a bad person. God [I am not Christian but I am using this as a general term for any diet(y/ies) you believe in] most likely would not have created it if he did not want you listen, would he? I am not the most religious man but I try to uphold my values and I find listening to Children of Bodom [somewhat Satanic] actually helps me stay on a straight path.

God would not have created killers if he did not want them to kill people but he did.

Anyway, i think you should be able to listen to what you like without it affecting religious beliefs etc.
[/quote]
That’s what I was saying.

God [I am not Christian but I am using this as a general term for any diet(y/ies) you believe in] most likely would not have created it if he did not want you listen, would he?

The reasoning there is completely incorrect.

Actually, It’s “if it feels good, stop”

Funny. But no.

You cannot prove it to be incorrect unless you are God.

God [I am not Christian but I am using this as a general term for any diet(y/ies) you believe in] most likely would not have created it if he did not want you listen, would he?

No human is 100% perfect, there will always be someone that do bad thing in the world, self presidents/leaders in a democracy can do thing that never should be done (Like Hitler and Bush.).

Yes, that’s what I was saying I believe God created flaws because they are natural, and it is up to people to decide what to do.[/quote]
But i don’t think God want you to do wrong thing, yes its up to people to decide what they, but not all things that God like you do.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd Question
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

pk4pk:

I would not do it. Just in case as you can never really know.

Things like that make me hate christian people. It’s hard to explain, but saying something like that pisses me off for some reason that I don’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd Question
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:8, topic:181558”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=243084.msg2054792#msg2054792 date=1203104644]
No, it doesn’t make you satanic. If you are a Christian, you automaticly believe in Satan. As long as you don’t worship him, you are no Satanic person.
[/quote]
A satanist isn’t someone who believes in Satan. It’s someone who follows Satan. Nice try with the play on words, though.[/quote]

That’s exactly what I said. Worshipper = follower.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd Question
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

No, it doesn’t make you satanic. If you are a Christian, you automaticly believe in Satan. As long as you don’t worship him, you are no Satanic person.

A satanist isn’t someone who believes in Satan. It’s someone who follows Satan. Nice try with the play on words, though.

[quote=“davidude36, post:7, topic:181558”]If you are worried that you will listen to it and some how be influenced to become “Satanic” then that is your own weak will power.

If you are strong will powered you can listen to it and not be swayed.[/quote]

Agreed. Though I must say, do not overestimate your own strength. I’ve been reading Reddit daily, a news site with an atheist streak, and their constant stabs are Christianity are always making me think about where the ignorance is… with Christians or with atheists.

[quote=“Cryme Time, post:1, topic:181558”]I know this is going to start another religous conflict but if your Christian, or follow any other god(notice how its not capitalized) would it make you a satanic follower if you listen to a satanic band.

Behemoth is such a great band, but they are satanic :\ so i’m just afraid if i listen to them it would make me satanic etc,

What i usually go by is it won’t effect you if you don’t want it to and you could still enjoy music and follow whatever you want, but i’m not sure if it’s true anymore.[/quote]

I personally don’t think it would affect you much, but you have to be your own judge on this. I listen to plenty of music about sex, drugs, and crap like that, but I refrain from all that, especially at parties.

Read full topic

If you are strong will powered you can listen to it and not be swayed.
